name: Mors Arcium
description:
The Short Version: A bunch of people killing each other endlessly. Have fun.

The Long Version: One day in the depths of hell, Satan grew restless, so 12 terrible people were thrown into an arena and forced to kill one another.
When they killed, they assumed the form of their victims.
This war raged on for eternity, with nothing but pure chaos to feed the tired minds of the damned.
This is Mors Arcium.

Now on Google Play!
